content: What is the most watched series on Netflix that was released after 2010?

As of my last update in 2023, one of the most-watched series on Netflix released after 2010 is "Stranger Things." This sci-fi horror series, which premiered in 2016, has gained a massive global following and has been praised for its storytelling, characters, and nostalgic appeal. However, it's important to note that viewing trends can change over time, and new series continue to be released on the platform, so there might be more recent entries that have surpassed it in terms of viewership.
